description.value:
You were trained by a group of spies who psionically infused silence into your every step and enhanced your ability to hear distant whispers. It wasnâ€™t until you got caught by an elementalist who blasted you with thunder that you learned the enhanced hearing had some nasty side effects.

Benefit: You can silently communicate with any creature, provided you share a language and can see each other.

Drawback: Sonic Weakness + 5
